com.sun.messaging

Class TopicConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.messaging.AdministeredObject
      • com.sun.messaging.BasicConnectionFactory
        • com.sun.messaging.ConnectionFactory
          • com.sun.messaging.TopicConnectionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ConnectionFactory, TopicConnectionFactory, javax.naming.Referenceable

    public class TopicConnectionFactory
extends ConnectionFactory
implements TopicConnectionFactory
    A TopicConnectionFactory is used to create TopicConnections with the Sun MQ Java Message Service (JMS) Publish/Subscribe (Pub/Sub) provider.
    See Also:
    javax.jms.TopicConnectionFactory, Serialized Form
